summary: Diff adds an order-status-aware OrdersSection UI, React Query hooks/types for status filtering and status updates, and a Motoko migration module wired into backend/main.mo. However, several backend requirements (status persistence, admin-only enforcement, and conditional migration behavior) are not verifiable from the truncated backend diff, and there are extra meta/project summary files not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend Order data includes a status field (Pending/Fulfilled/Cancelled), defaults new orders to an initial status (e.g., Pending), and allows admins to update status without changing immutable order id and existing order date.
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend is updated to use OrderStatus and update status, but backend/main.mo is truncated before any Order type/method implementations, so the status field, defaulting behavior on create, and immutability constraints for id/orderDate cannot be confirmed from the provided diff evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add backend canister methods and React Query hooks to support status and status updates, enforcing admin-only access for mutations and appropriate access for queries.
missing_requirements.reason: React Query hooks appear to exist, but the diff does not show the actual order/status-related hook implementations (portion of useQueries.ts is truncated) nor any backend method definitions or admin-only authorization checks for status mutation methods (backend/main.mo is truncated).

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide a conditional Motoko migration when adding status changes stable state shape, initializing default status for existing orders on upgrade.
missing_requirements.reason: A migration module is added that sets status to #Pending, but there is no evidence that the migration is conditional (only runs when upgrading from older state lacking the field). The wiring shown in backend/main.mo does not demonstrate any conditional logic by itself.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor with all logic in backend/main.mo.
missing_requirements.reason: A new Motoko source file backend/migration.mo is added containing migration logic, which places backend logic outside backend/main.mo.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated project meta-tracking files (project_state.json) unrelated to implementing Orders management features.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest requirements/non-goals/constraints; appears to be internal bookkeeping rather than product functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated frontend-file-summaries.txt containing narrative summaries of many frontend files and features (SEO, cinematic theme, QR code generator, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; also describes changes/features outside the Orders management scope.
